Uses of Class
com.azure.core.credential.TokenRequestContext

  • Packages that use TokenRequestContext 
    Package Description
    com.azure.core.credential
    Package containing basic credential classes for authentication purposes.
    com.azure.identity
    Package containing various types of credentials and classes for retrieving access tokens from various configurations.
    com.azure.messaging.eventhubs
    Package containing classes for creating an EventHubClient or an EventHubAsyncClient to perform operations on Azure Event Hubs.

    • Uses of TokenRequestContext in com.azure.core.credential

      Methods in com.azure.core.credential that return TokenRequestContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TokenRequestContext TokenRequestContext.addScopes(String... scopes)
      Adds one or more scopes to the request scopes.
      TokenRequestContext TokenRequestContext.setScopes(List<String> scopes)
      Sets the scopes required for the token.
      Methods in com.azure.core.credential with parameters of type TokenRequestContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Mono<AccessToken> BasicAuthenticationCredential.getToken(TokenRequestContext request) 
      Mono<AccessToken> TokenCredential.getToken(TokenRequestContext request)
      Asynchronously get a token for a given resource/audience.

    • Uses of TokenRequestContext in com.azure.messaging.eventhubs

      Methods in com.azure.messaging.eventhubs with parameters of type TokenRequestContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Mono<AccessToken> EventHubSharedAccessKeyCredential.getToken(TokenRequestContext request)
      Retrieves the token, given the audience/resources requested, for use in authorization against an Event Hubs namespace or a specific Event Hub instance.
